thread.title: Mark Tokeley
thread.title_full: Clubhouse Golf reviewed by Mark Tokeley

author: Mark Tokeley
title: Mark Tokeley
text:
I was looking for a specific pair of golf shoes (Nike Lunar Control 4) and Clubhouse Golf offered the best price and choice of colours that I could find anywhere - my local pro and local "US" golf store couldn't price match even if I'd been prepared to compromise on colour (volt green anyone?).
Paid for next day delivery and correspondence from carrier was also very good. Will definitely be shopping with Clubhouse Golf again.
